verses.verse: Out of the depths<WH4615> I have cried<WH7121> to you,<WH3068> Yahweh.
Lord,<WH136> hear<WH8085> my voice.<WH6963> Let your ears<WH241> be attentive<WH7183> to the voice<WH6963> of my petitions.<WH8469>
If you,<WH3050> Yah, kept a record<WH8104> of sins,<WH5771> Lord,<WH136> who could stand?<WH5975>
But there is forgiveness<WH5547> with you,<WH3372> therefore you are feared.
I wait<WH6960> for Yahweh.<WH3068> My soul<WH5315> waits.<WH6960> I hope<WH3176> in his word.<WH1697>
My soul<WH5315> longs for the Lord<WH136> more than watchmen<WH8104> long for the morning;<WH1242> more than watchmen<WH8104> for the morning.<WH1242>
Israel,<WH3478> hope<WH3176> in Yahweh,<WH3068> for with Yahweh<WH3068> there is loving kindness.<WH2617> With him is abundant<WH7235> redemption.<WH6304>
He will redeem<WH6299> Israel<WH3478> from all their sins.<WH5771>
